texts.content_text2: What is the main purpose of arranging seating at the child’s eye level?
texts.content_text100: To maintain control of the meeting
texts.content_text101: To create a more equal and comfortable atmosphere
texts.content_text103: To observe the child more easily
texts.content_text_feedback: Sitting at eye level reduces power imbalance and helps the child feel safe and respected, encouraging communication.
